page.shortlink: api a5 eval valid table set function
page.prototype: Result as L = a5_eval_valid_table_set(expression as C, table_set_name as C)

argument.name: table_set_name
argument.description: Name of a table or set.

return.name: Result
return.description: If expression is valid, returns .t.; otherwise .f. If *[xb:expression]* is empty, *[xb:Result]* will be .t.
